CustomMetadata.label: SMS CP Brokerage Invoice Payment Cleared

values.value: Hi {{{Broker_Payment__c.Channel_Partner_Name__c}}} Your payment against the invoice {{{Broker_Payment__c.Invoice_no__c}}} for the Booking Id {{{Broker_Payment__c.Booking__c}}} has been credited to your account! Thank you for your time and effort. For queries contact {{{Broker_Payment__c.Broker_Payment_Owner_Email__c}}} Dynamix Group
